Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Franklin
ShortDescription: Northbound #37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Wacker, LaSalle, Grand and Orleans due to street blockage near Wacker/Franklin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Wacker, LaSalle, Grand and Orleans due to street blockage near Wacker/Franklin.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/80th
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Morgan, 83rd & Halsted: due to street blockage near Halsted/80th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Morgan, 83rd & Halsted: due to street blockage near Halsted/80th.

Allow extra travel time.
